entry.content:
Apr 6, 14:26 UTC

Apr 6, 12:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 6, 09:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/04/2023 12:00 UTC
End time : 06/04/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Customer won't be able to add new image during the maintenance period. Existing images remain available.
Service improvement : To resolve ongoing incident incident that is affecting the performance of the private registry, we will migrate clients that are at the M and L plan level to a different infrastructure to improve performance and resolve the incident.
